help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get support
help.no_results: No results found. Try a different search term or category.

quick_links.contact_support_desc: Get help from our support team

questions.question: How do I add a new table?
questions.answer: Navigate to the Tables page and click the 'Add Table' button in the top right. Fill in the table details including number, capacity, and area, then save.

questions.question: How to process a new order?
questions.answer: Go to Orders page, click 'New Order', select the table, add menu items, and confirm. The order will be sent to the kitchen automatically.

questions.question: How do I manage staff schedules?
questions.answer: In the Staff section, click on a staff member's profile and select 'Schedule'. You can assign shifts, set working hours, and manage time-off requests.

questions.question: How to update menu items?
questions.answer: Go to Menu page, find the item you want to update, click the Edit button. You can change name, price, description, availability, and category.

questions.question: How do I generate reports?
questions.answer: Visit the Analytics page and select the type of report you need (sales, revenue, inventory). Choose the date range and click 'Generate Report'.

questions.question: How to handle payment processing?
questions.answer: When an order is completed, click on the order and select 'Process Payment'. Choose payment method (cash, card, or digital) and confirm the transaction.

questions.question: How do I change my password?
questions.answer: Go to Settings > Security tab. Enter your current password, then your new password twice, and click 'Update Password'.

questions.question: How to manage table reservations?
questions.answer: In the Tables page, click on a table and select 'Reserve'. Enter customer details, reservation time, and number of guests. The table status will update automatically.

errors.number_min: Table number must be at least 1

hero.title: Optimize restaurant operations with RestX
hero.description: Manage tables, orders, kitchen, inventory and reports on a single platform.

features.description: All the tools you need to run your restaurant – in one intuitive interface.

table_management.title: Smart Table Management
table_management.description: Automatic table reservation system with intuitive interface, helping optimize table layout and reduce waiting time for customers.

order_kot.title: Seamless Order & KOT
order_kot.description: Sync orders from waiter to kitchen instantly. Track dish status in real-time and minimize errors.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Accurate inventory control, low stock alerts, and optimize purchasing costs according to business cycles.

reports.title: Real-time Reports
reports.description: Dashboard analyzing revenue, best-selling dishes, staff performance. All data updated in real-time.

multi_branch.title: Multi-branch
multi_branch.description: Manage multiple stores on one system. Sync menu, pricing and aggregate centralized reports.

integration.title: Flexible Integration
integration.description: Connect with payment gateways, delivery, accounting and third-party apps via open API.

workflow.title: How RestX works in your restaurant
workflow.description: From table booking to bill settlement, every step is supported by RestX.

setup.title: Restaurant & Menu Setup
setup.description: Configure restaurant info, create menu, set up tables and staff permissions in minutes.

operation.title: Operation & Real-time Sync
operation.description: Receive orders, process payments, send orders to kitchen automatically. All changes updated instantly on all devices.

analysis.title: Analysis & Optimization
analysis.description: View detailed reports on revenue, best sellers, costs. Use data to make smarter business decisions.

testimonials.title: What restaurants say about RestX?
testimonials.description: Hundreds of restaurant owners and managers have trusted RestX to optimize their operations.

nam.quote: RestX has completely changed how we operate. From table reservations to inventory management, everything is automated and much more accurate.

huong.quote: I used to spend hours aggregating reports from 5 branches. Now with RestX, all data is available on the dashboard in a few clicks.

tuan.quote: Simple interface, staff learns very quickly. Stable system, never encountered errors during peak hours. Recommend for every restaurant!

lan.quote: We love the real-time sync feature. Orders from app to kitchen in just 1 second, customers are very satisfied with service speed.

footer.tagline: RestX – Next generation restaurant operations platform. Helping you manage every aspect of your restaurant on a single system.

hero.title: Exquisite Tastes
hero.subtitle: Experience world-class dining with dishes crafted from the freshest ingredients.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At RestX Restaurant, we put our customers first. With a dedicated staff and unique recipes, we are committed to providing the best dining experience. Each dish is carefully prepared with the freshest ingredients, creating a special flavor found nowhere else. We sincerely thank you for your support.

customers.title: Customer Management
customers.subtitle: View and manage your restaurant's customer information
